SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ad
The Ad class represents an advertisement in the Leboncoin application.
AdminAdService
The AdminAdService class provides methods for admin ad management, including creating, updating, and deleting ads for users.
AdminMode
The AdminMode class provides the functionality for running the application in admin mode.
AdminUserService
The AdminUserService class provides methods for admin user management, including updating user profiles and deleting user accounts.
AdsRepository
The AdsRepository class provides methods to read ad data from a JSON file.
Application
The Application class is the entry point for the Leboncoin backend simulation.
DataInitializer
The DataInitializer class provides methods to initialize user and ad data from files.
InternalAd
The InternalAd class provides internal methods for managing ads, including creating, updating, and deleting ads.
InternalUser
The InternalUser class provides internal methods for managing users, including creating, updating, and deleting user profiles.
InvalidAdInformations
The InvalidAdInformations class represents a custom exception that is thrown when ad information is invalid and an ad cannot be created.
InvalidUserInformations
The InvalidUserInformations class represents a custom exception that is thrown when user information is invalid and a user cannot be created.
TerminalColor
The TerminalColor class provides constants for terminal text color codes.
User
The User class represents a user in the Leboncoin application.
UserAdService
The UserAdService class provides methods for user ad management, including creating, updating, and deleting ads.
UserMode
The UserMode class provides the functionality for running the application in user mode.
UserService
The UserService class provides methods for user profile updates and account deletions.
UsersRepository
The UsersRepository class provides methods to read user data from a JSON file.
UtilAd
The UtilAd class provides utility methods for managing ads, including displaying ads, fetching and choosing ads, and processing ad input.
UtilUser
The UtilUser class provides utility methods for managing users and their ads, including assigning ads to users, displaying user information, and processing user input.
